it forms the stones then brings forth

a yearning for the higher thus dwells in

the will reaches up to this phantom

when he becomes aware of the will man

there are means however by which man can

one of these is art
through art man is able to raise himself

while other mental images are merely

it is different in the case of art

here the artist combined many

he retained in his memory all the assets

he formed an archetype from many human

schopenhauer says that the true artist

man attains deliverance
this is the case with all the arts

tone however is a direct expression of

image when man is artistically engaged

he perceives the will of nature and

man stands in an intimate relationship
